__e: It was to be an axe age, a sword age, a storm age, when brother would turn against brother, and men would fight each other until the world was finally destroyed.
Tonight, the Age of Man comes to an end.
It's like the era of yes has begun.
Hold both thoughts as irrefutable and equal, because this is how we must live now in the final age of man.
It was the dawn of the Third Age of mankind 10 years after the Earth-Minbari War.
I need to open new supply corridors. You helped build this place.
We no longer live in an age of miracles, Monsieur Marshak.
He's a seeker of truth in an age of fear.
Yes, sir, a veritable age of reason like the one they had in France, and not a moment too soon.
When you've flown our people back to the surface then the new era we have dreamed of, will begin.
If this is the Age of Ragnarok, Keitel Blacksmith, it is good to us.
You will never feel safe again, so prepare yourselves, for this... is the Age of Joe Carroll, and my name will live forever.
